Billy Sheeb

  1. Alternate Birth Name: Willie Sheeb
  2. Foster Name: Willie
  3. Foster Family: Reese Thompson
  4. Location of Family: Cowles, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: Red Cloud, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: Unknown
  8. Date of Birth: Unknown
  9. Gender: male
  10. Source: Journey's End: An Orphan Train Rider's Story, (n.p.), p. 41-48 [Train to Red Cloud]; Interview with George Wells, 12 July 1983 by Don Connors and Mildred Bennett.
